oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Mass Meeting of the Seventh Tennessee Cavalry" 1865 pamphlet expressing resolve to fight on
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pamphlet describing the proceedings of a mass meeting of the 7th Tenn. Cav., Rucker's Brigade, Jackson's Division, CSA. The resolutions expressed by this meeting of officers and enlisted men, despite the short time remaining for hostilities, are defiant and unyielding in their opposition to re-joining the Union. They also address the subjects of ferreting out non-combatants and enlisting slaves to fight for the Confederacy.
